Flying, haste
When Burning Miracle enters the battlefield, create a Faith token attached to another target creature you control. [i](It’s an Aura with “Enchanted creature gets +1/+1” and “When enchanted creature dies, create a tapped 1/1 white Human creature token.” )[/i]
Whenever an enchanted creature you control dies, you may return Burning Miracle from your graveyard to your hand.
